form.prompt: Key your examples containing ordinal numbers here:

radioGroup.prompt: How are ordinal numbers formed in your language?
radioGroup.radio: An affix is added to the cardinal number.

form.instruction: In the lexicon, mark the affix with the feature ordinal. Also, mark the words meaning next and last with this feature.
In the lexicon, mark each word with the feature ordinal.

radioGroup.prompt: Where do ordinal adjectives occur with respect to the cardinal number?
radioGroup.codeInfo: Before is QP as Numbers Option 1; is Spec-initial default; is Spec-internal default.
After is QP as Numbers Option 2; is Spec-final default.
radioGroup.radio: On either side of the cardinal number
radioGroup.codeInfo: Either is QP as Numbers Option 3.
